name: tm54
effect: Teaches False Swipe to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches False Swipe to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A restrained attack that prevents the
foe from fainting. The target is left
with at least 1 HP.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user gathers all its light energy and releases it
all at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five
rocks are launched in a row.
